Rsdtm 0.0.9017
  • Reference

    Generate a regular expression matching an ISO8601 calendar year

    pattern_ISO8601_calendar_year.Rd

    Generate a regular expression matching an ISO8601 calendar year

    Usage

    pattern_ISO8601_calendar_year(allow_before_year_1583 = FALSE)

    Arguments

    allow_before_year_1583

    Should years between 0 and 1582 be allowed (they are only allowed in ISO 8601 with mutual agreement)

    Details

    Sign on the year (+ or -) is not supported (therefore years before 0000 are not supported). Years after 9999 are not supported.

    References

    https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601

    See also

    Other ISO8601 patterns: pattern_ISO8601_any_datetime(), pattern_ISO8601_any_date(), pattern_ISO8601_calendar_datetime(), pattern_ISO8601_calendar_date(), pattern_ISO8601_ordinal_datetime(), pattern_ISO8601_ordinal_date(), pattern_ISO8601_timezone(), pattern_ISO8601_time(), pattern_ISO8601_week_datetime(), pattern_ISO8601_week_date()
